price: ߊ߬ ߣߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߕߊߣߌ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߡߊߦߟߍ ߘߴߌߞߘߐ߫
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
